1.0.0.name: wordpress/jigoshop-basic-weight-shipping
1.0.0.description:
Extend the Jigoshop shipping methods by adding a basic weight method.

This is a very simple plugin that allows you to set weight based shipping fees. Five levels of weights are alowed. Example: level1 = 2kg with next field as 10 CHF = the total weight of an order in the cart is between 0kg and 2 kg and has a fee of 10 CHF. Example: level2 = 5 kg with next field as 20 CHF = the total weight of an order in the cart is between 2kg and 5 kg and has a fee of 20 CHF. etc.

My thanks goes to Iain at Polevaultweb, who developed a basic bundle shipping plugin for jigoshop. You can find his plugin at http://jigoshop.com/product/basic-bundle-shipping/

Plugin Page | @gasserol |
